parameters.name: InstanceClass
parameters.description:
The instance class of the two-way synchronization task. Valid values: **large**, **medium**, **micro**, and **small**.

>  For more information, see [Specifications of data synchronization instances](~~26605~~).

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the data synchronization instance. You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the DTS instance. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).
